definitions.text: a statement that expresses a personal opinion or belief or adds information
examples: from time to time she contributed a personal comment on his account

definitions.text: a written explanation or criticism or illustration that is added to a book or other textual material
examples: he wrote an extended comment on the proposal

definitions.text: a report (often malicious) about the behavior of other people
make or write a comment on
examples: he commented the paper of his colleague

definitions.text: provide interlinear explanations for words or phrases
examples: He annotated on what his teacher had written
